An Even More Minimal Theme

Source: R/theme_minimal2.R
theme_minimal2.Rd

This ggplot2 theme provide even more white area and less clutter than theme_minimal().

theme_minimal2(...)

Arguments

...

arguments passed on to ggplot2::theme()

Examples

plot2(iris)
#> i Using x = Sepal.Length
#> i Using y = Sepal.Width
#> i Using category = Species
#> i Using type = "point" since both axes are numeric

plot2(admitted_patients, x = hospital, category = gender)
#> i Using y = patient_id
#> i Using type = "boxplot" since all groups in hospital and gender contain at least three values
